KnowledgeBase.Title: Example NumVector compareGT 014
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareGT function to compare two Vectors and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding values of each Vector are compared to determine whether one Vector is greater than the other.

Syntax.Note: The Vectors are equal since their values are equal.
